name: data_from_to_number
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool unitconversion.
Tool description: App to easily convert units
API description: Performs a data unit conversion from one unit to another using the RapidAPI service.

number.description: The numerical value to be converted.

to.description: The unit to convert the number to.

is_from.description: The unit of the numerical value being converted from.
